# Support

Thank you for using this project! This document explains how to get help with the BOINC information site.

## How to Get Help

### Documentation

- **README**: Check the [README.md](../README.md) for general information about BOINC and how to get started.
- **Contributing Guide**: Review [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for information on how to contribute to this project.
- **Security Policy**: For security concerns, see [SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md).

### Issues

If you've found a bug or have a feature request:

1. Search the [existing issues](https://github.com/mat-0/boinc.thechels.uk/issues) to see if someone else has already reported it.
2. If no existing issue covers your concern, [create a new issue](https://github.com/mat-0/boinc.thechels.uk/issues/new/choose) using the appropriate template.
3. Provide as much detail as possible to help us understand and address your concern.

### Questions and Discussions

For general questions or discussions:

- Open an issue with the question or discussion label
- Reach out on X/Twitter to [@sidcelery](https://x.com/sidcelery)

### Response Times

This is a hobby project maintained by a single owner. While we strive to respond to issues and questions in a timely manner, please understand that response times may vary.

## What NOT to Report

- **BOINC Software Issues**: This site provides information about BOINC. For issues with the BOINC software itself, please visit the [official BOINC website](https://boinc.berkeley.edu/).
- **Project-Specific Issues**: For issues with specific projects like Rosetta or World Community Grid, please contact those projects directly.

## Code of Conduct

Please note that all interactions are subject to our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). We expect all community members to be respectful and professional.
